Name: OpenRCA Bank
Desc: A banking service application from the OpenRCA dataset. Contains Tomcat application servers (Tomcat01-04), MySQL databases (Mysql01-02), Redis caches (Redis01-02), integration gateways (IG01-02, MG01-02), and Apache web servers (apache01-02). Uses pre-recorded telemetry data (logs, metrics, traces) with 44 fault injection scenarios covering CPU, memory, disk I/O, JVM OOM, and network faults. Only telemetry for days 2021-03-04 through 2021-03-07 is available.
